radikalchess.model.checkers

Class MovementRangeChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • radikalchess.model.checkers.MovementRangeChecker

  • public class MovementRangeChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a special class of checking (respects the Singleton pattern) giving the attack range of a piece in a certain position. Likewise, and from this, you can also get the destructible ("Killable") pieces
    Author:
    Jose Luis Molina
